modName: Book of Knowledge - Atagea - Max your skills
summary: With this book, you can max out your character's stats! Even better, if you use the community level uncapper, you can use this multiple times.
descriptionHtml:
I make a lot of characters in Skyrim, and not all of them are for playing through the game, so I've made an immersive version of cheating. Yay me.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What this mod does:

-Adds a new book that advances each of your skills by 85 levels!
-Adds a little Dwemer Ruin in which the book awaits

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recommended mods:

-Skyrim Community Uncapper (If you want to use this book multiple times):Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Compatability:

This mod should be compatible with every other mod on the Nexus, however if it isn't, please leave a comment or private message me, explaining the specific issue and which mod is conflicting with mine.
author: Frinovskii
